attributes.action: To train waitresses and mangers on gluten free
attributes.additional_details: To train all mangers and waitresses in restaurants in the whole of the uk on gluten free and it’s risks
attributes.background: To train all mangers and waitresses in restaurants in the whole of the uk on gluten

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about training for hospitality staff are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
